lead_paragraph: Benjamin, who missed Carolina’s 17-2 season with a knee injury, says he understands that his role may have changed since 2014, when he was Cam Newton’s No. 1 target.

headline.print_headline: Panthers Receiver Rejoins an Offense That Stayed Potent
headline.main: Kelvin Benjamin Rejoins a Panthers Offense That Stayed Potent Without Him

snippet: Benjamin, who missed Carolina’s 17-2 season with a knee injury, says he understands that his role may have changed since 2014, when he was Cam Newton’s No. 1 target.
